page.title: 13FARMING AROUND KEELBY
page.content: The area around Keelby is very fertile farmland. This means that the area is nearly covered entirely by fields. There are many different crops.In this area the main crop is winter wheat or rape.Other crops you will see are sugarbeet,potatoes,barley and peas. A farmers year with corn has many careful stages from grains of corn to a field of swaying straw.First you plough a certain field.It is better to plant a crop in a field which had a different crop in it from last year.Then you harrow the field. Harrowing is the same as ploughing but finer.After the harrowing comes drilling.This is when the farmer plants or sows the seeds.Then when the shoots half the size of the finished product the farmer sprays the shoots.the farmer sprays the shoots with pesticides and herbicides.
